definition: you (plural)
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: Further Practice for Pairs ·Add a third speaker and create your own lines.
sentences.chinese: 加进圈外人，创作你们自己的对话。

sentences.english: You must prevent the children from touching the dangerous things.
sentences.chinese: 你们务必不要让孩子接触危险物品。

sentences.english: I think you are too busy to take an afternoon off.
sentences.chinese: 我想你们真是忙得连个下午都抽不出来了。

sentences.english: I authorize you to hit 'em a tremendous whack.
sentences.chinese: 我授权你们，向他们放一排狠毒的排枪。

sentences.english: So you testify against yourselves that you are the descendants of those who murdered the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 这就是你们自己证明，是杀害先知者的子孙了。

sentences.english: Cor. 2:8 Therefore I exhort you to confirm your love toward him.
sentences.chinese: 林后二8所以我劝你们，要向他证实你们的爱。

sentences.english: Cor. 2:8 Therefore I exhort you to confirm your love toward him.
sentences.chinese: 林后二8所以我劝你们，要向他证实你们的爱。
你们大部分人采访报道过我。

sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious receptionhospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我愿向你们盛情的接待与款待表示衷心的感谢。
欢迎你们来到云林机场。

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界卫生日，我祝愿你们大家身心健康。

sentences.english: Do you do homework every day?
sentences.chinese: 你们每天都做家庭作业吗？

sentences.english: And it’s goingto be up to you to make an even bigger difference over the next 40years.
sentences.chinese: 未来40年更大的改变也将取决于你们。

sentences.english: Yet the timeless in you is aware of life's timelessness
sentences.chinese: 然而你们心中的无限，意识到生命的无限。

sentences.english: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
sentences.chinese: 然而你们连一根头发，也必不损坏。

definition: (onom.) smack!
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
we/us/ourselves/our
(question particle for "yes-no" questions)
see 嗎啡|吗啡, morphine
I/me/my
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
woolen material

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
everybody/all (guests, colleagues etc)/all of you
everyone/influential family/great expert
they
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
surname Yao
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
(onom.) laughing out loud
